current.swim_lane_filter_table = ''; } if (current.field.changes()) { current.lane_filter = ''; current.lane_filter_table = ''; } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-09-08 09:22:42</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1e8ec5df4341311056f67ecd85b8f2b0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Clear lane filters on lane changes</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Visual Task Boards" source="com.glide.ui.vtb">d1d3fca43c31311068bcf327dfe37f30</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1e8ec5df4341311056f67ecd85b8f2b0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-09-11 07:53:11</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1e8ec5df4341311056f67ecd85b8f2b0"/> </record_update>
